cinnamon.engine.object

Class ContactGraph.Contact

  • java.lang.Object
    • cinnamon.engine.object.ContactGraph.Contact
  • Enclosing class:
    ContactGraph<E extends ContactGraph.Contact>

    public abstract static class ContactGraph.Contact
extends Object

    Represents contact between two BodyComponents.

    A Contact carries not only the colliding bodies but also the Detection.Manifold describing the collision. A flag is provided through isHandled() and its related methods to mark whether or not a Contact has been processed during a frame.

    The persistence of a Contact, i.e. number of frames it has existed through, can be retrieved with getPersistence() and requires clearHandle() ()} to be called once at the end of every frame. Calling handle more than once in a frame or not calling it at all will result in inaccurate persistence. Furthermore, clearing a Contact's handle flag at the end of a frame or beginning of the next provides a clearer representation of a Contact's frame persistence as the frame is not counted until it is considered complete.
